name: Newtown Cozy Stays
description:
Welcome to Newtown Cozy Stays
Step into a boutique hotel that seamlessly blends unique charm with modern comforts, creating an inviting, home-like atmosphere in the heart of Newtown. Designed with the discerning traveller in mind, our meticulously appointed rooms offer a tranquil retreat from the urban hustle.
Each room is carefully crafted to maximize both comfort and functionality. Whether you're a budget-conscious traveller or simply seeking relaxation, you’ll appreciate high-speed complimentary Wi Fi and the option of well-maintained shared bathrooms alongside our standard ensuite offerings, all adorned with tasteful décor that radiates warmth. For a breath of fresh air, select rooms feature private balconies that showcase views of a vibrant, local neighbourhood.
Our commitment to excellence shines throughout the property. Every space—from rooms to corridors, common areas, and balconies—is designated non-smoking, ensuring a fresh and healthy environment for every guest. Although our charming building does not feature a lift, our attentive staff is always on hand to assist with your luggage and any special requests, guaranteeing a seamless, stress-free experience.
Perfectly situated in a lively section of Newtown, our hotel provides effortless access to local cafés, boutique shops, art galleries, and cultural landmarks. With unrestricted free street parking available on Camden or Alice Street, exploring the dynamic surroundings has never been easier.
Whether you’re planning a brief visit or an extended stay, Newtown Cozy Stays masterfully combines comfort, style, and personalized service to ensure that every moment is not only relaxing and memorable but truly inspiring. Enjoy your stay!

groupInformation.terms:
Any group bookings must be confirmed directly by hotel management via email and payment must be made in full prior to arrival.

Email confirmation from hotel management with confirm room availability and room types availability on the requested date.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
All goup bookings are NON-REFUNDABLE Booking and must be paid in full 3 weeks before arrival.

Dates modification may be permitted subject to availability. No refund when there is a reduction in number of rooms booked.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
Please note this property has a strict 'No Party Policy.' (No Party and No Smoking) 
No smoking inside the bedroom and all common areas inside the building. 
False smoke alarm activation will incur $1,750 penalties payable by the guest for each incident. Additional cleaning fees of $550 may also be applied) 

Please note that a valid credit card and photo ID of the guest must be provided at check-in. ($30 late check-in fee applies when checking in between 9PM - 11PM. After 11PM will be considered as no-shows, unless organized prior with receptionist)

houseRules.notes:
All rooms Non-Smoking
Check-In and Check-Out
• Check-In:
Standard check-in is from 2:30 PM to 9:00 PM. Early or late arrivals outside this period may incur additional fees.
• Check-Out:
Standard check-out is at 10:00 AM. Late check-out (up to 1:00 PM) may incur an extra charge of $30 per room, subject to availability and prior arrangement.
Parties not permitted. 
No consumption of alcohol in public areas. 
Visitors of guests must leave premises by 12 midnight. 
Hotel common areas closed after 12 midnight.
